Description: Restrict console outputs to all infos, warning or errors only
Custom format for log messages. See `LogRecord <https://docs.python.org/3/library/logging.html#logging.LogRecord>`_ attributes.
Switch to enable the creation of the raster ``natura.tiff`` via the rule :mod:`build_natura_raster`.
Switch to build the base network into specific regions via the rule :mod:`build_topology` or whether to keep use a pre-build base network.
Switch to enable the building of cutouts via the rule :mod:`build_cutout`.
Model defaults to Eskom hourly pu profiles for all wind and solar generators via :mod:`add_electricity`.
Model defaults to excel input hourly pu profiles for all wind and solar generators.
Switch to enable calculation of renewable profiles using atlite and Global Wind Atlas.
